subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Elite 24 High School game at Rucker Park two years ago, featuring Michael Beasley, Jerryd Bayless and Kevin Love, became the basis for a documentary, “Gunnin’ For That #1 Spot.”
snippet: The Elite 24 High School game at Rucker Park two years ago, featuring Michael Beasley, Jerryd Bayless and Kevin Love, became the basis for a documentary, “Gunnin’ For That #1 Spot.”
